title: Optimization issue Kindred One For All
body:
So I was playing on the new One For All Mode Lottery and managed to get into a game with Kindred vs Mordekaiser (I was Kindred by the way)  During the game I didn't really notice my fps which seemed fine at the start until I notice I was running the game at around 80 fps with uncapped framerate and no vsync which seemed very odd. During intensive moments was noticing some fps drops down to the 30's until when we were about to loose the lag is extremely prominent which drop down to the teens when Kindred skills pops everywhere on the screen. My system should handle this game without any sweat but why did it go down onto its knees. Here are my specs: 

Xeon 1231v3 
Cooler Master Hyper 212 with 2 fans
R9 290 Sapphire Tri X OC 
8GBS RAM 
750w EVGA Super Nova G2
Crucial MX100 256GB which League of Legends is on
1TB WD Blue.
Cougar Spike Case with the side panel off.

PS. I lost that game, Mord is stupid.
